Address.value: 9804 MEDICAL CENTER DRIVE,SUITE 210, ROCKVILLE, Maryland, 20850, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Regenxbio Inc is a biotechnology company. Its main activity is the development and commercialization of recombinant adeno-associated virus gene therapy to correct an underlying genetic defect. The diseases that Regenxbio platform targets are metabolic (homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia), neurodegenerative conditions (mucopolysaccharidosis), and retinal diseases (wet age-related macular degeneration, X-linked retinitis pigmentosa).
